item.title: Uninstalling KubeSphere and Kubernetes
item.description: You can delete the cluster by the following command. Tip Uninstall will remove KubeSphere and Kubernetes from the machines. This operation is irreversible and does not have any backup. Please be caution with operation. If you started with the quick start (all-in-one): ./kk delete cluster If you started with the advanced mode (created with a configuration file): ./kk delete cluster [-f config-sample.yaml]
